titles.title: Take the Name of Jesus With You

verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Precious name, O how sweet!
Hope of earth
and joy of heaven.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Take the name of Jesus
with you,
Child of sorrow and of woe.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
It will joy and comfort
give you,
Take it then
where'er you go.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Take the name of Jesus ever
As a shield
from every snare.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
If temptations
'round you gather,
Breathe that holy name
in prayer.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O the precious name
of Jesus!
How it thrills our souls with joy.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
When His loving arms
receive us
And His songs
our tongues employ!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
At the name of Jesus bowing,
Falling prostrate
at His feet.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
King of kings,
in heaven we'll crown Him,
When our journey
is complete.
